metrics.name: Average accounts receivable creation to clearing time
metrics.description: Average time from accounts receivable creation to clearing

metrics.name: Average net payment terms
metrics.description: Average of net payment terms in days

metrics.name: Average payment delay
metrics.description: Average delay of payments in days

metrics.name: Average project creation to end time
metrics.description: Average time from project creation to project end date

metrics.name: Average project creation to start time
metrics.description: Average time from project creation to project start date

metrics.name: Average project planned to actual end time
metrics.description: Average time from planned project end to actual project end date

metrics.name: Average project start to end time
metrics.description: Average time from project start to project end date

metrics.name: Average timesheet approval time
metrics.description: Average time from timesheet creation to timesheet approval

metrics.name: Billing request (DMR) rejection rate
metrics.description: Percentage of billing requests (debit memo requests) that were rejected

metrics.name: Invoice cancellation rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices (billing documents) that were canceled

metrics.description: Number of invoices (billing documents) that were canceled

metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared one or more days after their due dates

metrics.name: Number of accounts receivable documents
metrics.description: Number of accounts receivable documents

metrics.name: Number of accounts receivable documents paid late
metrics.description: Number of accounts receivable documents that were cleared one or more days after their due dates

metrics.description: Number of timesheet records in status 'Approved'

metrics.name: Number of non-approved timesheets
metrics.description: Number of timesheet records that are not in status 'Approved'

metrics.name: Number of billing requests (DMR)
metrics.description: Number of billing requests (debit memo requests)

metrics.name: Number of canceled timesheets
metrics.description: Number of canceled Timesheet Records

metrics.description: Number of projects that are neither cleared nor closed and had no activity during a certain time frame

metrics.description: Number of rejected billing requests (debit memo requests)

metrics.name: Number of open accounts receivable documents (with time frame)
metrics.description: Number of accounts receivable documents open for longer than a certain time frame

metrics.name: Number of open accounts receivable documents
metrics.description: Number of accounts receivable documents that are not yet cleared

metrics.name: Number of timesheets
metrics.description: Number of timesheet records

metrics.name: Number of timesheets created per project
metrics.description: Number of timesheet records created per project

metrics.name: On-time payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared on or before the due date

metrics.description: Percentage of projects in the stage 'Closed'

metrics.description: Percentage of projects in the stage 'Completed'

metrics.description: Number of projects in the stage 'Completed'

metrics.name: Percentage of projects created after start date
metrics.description: Percentage of projects that were created after the defined start date

metrics.name: Number of projects created after start date
metrics.description: Number of projects that were created after the defined start date

metrics.description: Percentage of projects in the stage 'Contract Preparation'

metrics.description: Number of projects in the stage 'Contract Preparation'

metrics.description: Number of projects in the stage 'In Execution'

metrics.description: Percentage of projects in the stage 'In Planning'

metrics.name: Number of projects in planning
metrics.description: Number of projects in the stage 'In Planning'

metrics.name: Percentage of open projects
metrics.description: Percentage of projects that are open, this means neither in the stage 'Closed' nor 'Completed'

metrics.description: Number of projects that are open, this means neither in the stage 'Closed' nor 'Completed'

metrics.name: Percentage of projects with costs after end date
metrics.description: Percentage of projects with costs being posted after the official end date

metrics.name: Total approved hours
metrics.description: Total amount of hours in approved timesheets

metrics.name: Total canceled hours
metrics.description: Total amount of hours in canceled timesheets

metrics.name: Total cleared amount
metrics.description: Total of all cleared amounts in accounts receivables

metrics.name: Total hours changed after approval
metrics.description: Total amount of hours in timesheets that have been changed after approval

metrics.name: Total hours in process
metrics.description: Total amount of hours in timesheets that are in status 'in process'

metrics.name: Total hours released for approval
metrics.description: Total amount of hours in timesheets that are in status 'released for approval'

metrics.name: Total invoiced amount
metrics.description: Total of all invoiced amounts in accounts receivables

metrics.name: Total open amount
metrics.description: Total of all open amounts in accounts receivables

metrics.name: Total overdue amount
metrics.description: Total of all amounts in accounts receivables that are overdue for longer than a certain time frame

metrics.name: Number of overdue accounts receivable documents
metrics.description: Number of all accounts receivable documents that are overdue for longer than a certain time frame

metrics.name: Number of projects with overdue accounts receivable documents
metrics.description: Number of projects that have at least one accounts receivable document that is overdue for longer than a certain time frame
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name) > 0
		   WHERE event_name = 'Create Accounts Receivable'
			 AND "ClearingDate" IS NULL
			 AND (NOW()-"NetDueDate") > DURATION ${p2c_s4hc_overdue_ar_period})
	)

metrics.name: Total paid late amount
metrics.description: Total of all amounts in accounts receivables that were cleared one or more days after their net due dates
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(${p2c_s4hc_amount_currency}) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name = 'Clear Accounts Receivable'
	  AND ("ClearingDate" - "NetDueDate") > DURATION '1day'
	)

metrics.name: Number of cleared accounts receivable documents
metrics.description: Number of accounts receivable documents that were fully cleared

metrics.name: Total rejected hours
metrics.description: Total amount of hours in rejected timesheets

variables.name: p2c_s4hc_idling_period
variables.description: Reference time period to consider for a project to be considered idle, for example '30 days'

variables.name: p2c_s4hc_open_ar_period
variables.description: Reference time period to consider for calculation of open AR documents, for example '30 days'

variables.name: p2c_s4hc_overdue_ar_period
variables.description: Reference time period to consider for calculation of overdue AR documents, for example '30 days' after net due date

variables.name: p2c_s4hc_invoiced_sum_currency
variables.description: Field defining in which currency the invoiced amounts are calculated, for example "AR_InvoicedAmountInGlobalCurrency"

variables.name: p2c_s4hc_cleared_sum_currency
variables.description: Field defining in which currency the cleared amounts are calculated, for example "AR_ClearedAmountInGlobalCurrency"

variables.name: p2c_s4hc_amount_currency
variables.description: Field defining in which currency the amounts are calculated on event level, for example "AmountInGlobalCurrency"
